body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth          Be a Junior Ranger Would you like to have fun while you explore White Sands? Then become a Junior Ranger!         Web Rangers No time to visit a park to do an activity book? Well, you can also become a Junior Ranger online!         Park Fun A visit to White Sands is always lots of fun! From sledding to hiking to building sand castles, there's always lots to do.         Fun Activities Are you looking for some fun activities that you can do and learn about the park, too? Well, we have created some neat activities that you can download and complete at home. Learn more...      Fact Sheets for Students      Recommended Reading
title: White Sands National Monument: Kids & Youth
